purpose_text.para: The control register for stage 1 of the EL2&0 translation regime.

text_before_fields.para: Unless stated otherwise, all the bits in TCR2_EL2 are permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
This field controls the enabling of the Alternate MECID translations for the EL2 translation regime.
TCR2_EL2.AMEC0 is provided to enable the safe update of TTBR0_EL2 and MECID_A0_EL2, by disabling access and speculation to AMEC=1 Block or Page descriptors during the update.

field_value_description.para: Use of a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 generates a Translation fault.
Accesses translated by a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 are associated with the MECID configured in MECID_A0_EL2.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.
Enables the Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.

field_value_description.para: Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is disabled.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Permit Translation table walk Incoherence.
Permits RCWS instructions to generate writes that have the Reduced Coherence property.
This bit is permitted to be implemented as a read-only bit with a fixed value of 0.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Write accesses generated by RCWS at EL2 or EL2&0 do not have the Reduced Coherence property.
Write accesses generated by RCWS at EL2 or EL2&0 have the Reduced Coherence property.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Enable Attribute Indexing Extension. Control for Attribute Indexing Extension for stage 1 EL2 translation.

field_value_description.para: Attribute Indexing Extension Disabled.
Attribute Indexing Extension Enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
POE. Controls setting of permission overlay for EL2 accesses in stage 1 of the EL2 translation regime.
This bit is not permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_value_description.para: Permission overlay disabled for EL2 access in stage 1 of EL2 translation regime.
Permission overlay enabled for EL2 access in stage 1 of EL2 translation regime.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Select Permission Model. Controls setting of indirect permission model in stage 1 EL2 translation.

field_value_description.para: Direct permission model.
Indirect permission model.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Protected attribute enable.Indicates use of bit[52] of the stage 1 translation table entry.

field_value_description.para: Bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry does not indicate protected attribute.
Bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry indicates protected attribute.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

text_before_fields.para: Unless stated otherwise, all the bits in TCR2_EL2, when they have the value 1, are permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Disable the Contiguous bit for the Start Table for TTBR1_EL2.

field_value_description.para: The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR1_EL2 is not affected by this field.
The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR1_EL2 is treated as 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_D128 is implemented and TCR2_EL2.D128 == 1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Disable the Contiguous bit for the Start Table for TTBR0_EL2.

field_value_description.para: The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR0_EL2 is not affected by this field.
The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR0_EL2 is treated as 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_D128 is implemented and TCR2_EL2.D128 == 1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
This field controls the enabling of the Alternate MECID translations for accesses in the TTBR1_EL2 half of the VA range, for the EL2&0 translation regime.
TCR2_EL2.AMEC1 is provided to enable the safe update of TTBR1_EL2 and MECID_A1_EL2, by disabling access and speculation to AMEC == 1 Block or Page descriptors during the update.

field_value_description.para: Use of a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 generates a Translation fault.
Accesses translated by a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 are associated with the MECID configured in MECID_A1_EL2.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
This field controls the enabling of the Alternate MECID translations for accesses in the TTBR0_EL2 half of the VA range, for the EL2&0 translation regime.
TCR2_EL2.AMEC0 is provided to enable the safe update of TTBR_EL2 and MECID_A_EL2, by disabling access and speculation to AMEC=1 Block or Page descriptors during the update.

field_value_description.para: Use of a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 generates a Translation fault.
Accesses translated by a Block or Page descriptor containing AMEC == 1 are associated with the MECID configured in MECID_A0_EL2.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.
Enables the Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.

field_value_description.para: Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is disabled.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Permit Translation table walk Incoherence.
Permits RCWS instructions to generate writes that have the Reduced Coherence property.
This bit is permitted to be implemented as a read-only bit with a fixed value of 0.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Write accesses generated by RCWS do not have the Reduced Coherence property.
Write accesses generated by RCWS have the Reduced Coherence property.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Skip Level associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL2.
This determines the number of levels to be skipped in the regular start level of the stage 1 EL2&0 translation table walks using TTBR1_EL2.
This field is IGNORED when TCR2_EL2.D128 is 0.

field_value_description.para: Skip 0 level in the regular start level.
Skip 1 level in the regular start level.
Skip 2 levels in the regular start level.
Skip 3 levels in the regular start level.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Skip Level associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.
This determines the number of levels to be skipped in the regular start level of the stage 1 EL2&0 translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.
This field is IGNORED when TCR2_EL2.D128 is 0.

field_value_description.para: Skip 0 level in the regular start level.
Skip 1 level in the regular start level.
Skip 2 levels in the regular start level.
Skip 3 levels in the regular start level.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enables VMSAv9-128 translation system for stage 1 EL2&0 translation.

field_value_description.para: Translation system follows VMSA-64 translation process.
Translation system follows VMSAv9-128 translation process.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enable Attribute Indexing Extension. Control for Attribute Indexing Extension for stage 1 EL2&0 translation.
This field is RES1 when TCR2_EL2.D128 is 1.

field_value_description.para: Attribute Indexing Extension Disabled.
Attribute Indexing Extension Enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
POE. Controls setting of permission overlay for EL2 accesses in stage 1 of the EL2&0 translation regime.
This bit is not permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_value_description.para: Permission overlay disabled for EL2 access in stage 1 of EL2&0 translation regime.
Permission overlay enabled for EL2 access in stage 1 of EL2&0 translation regime.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
EL0 POE. controls setting of permission overlay in stage 1 of the EL2 translation regime.
This bit is not permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_value_description.para: Permission overlay disabled for EL0 access in stage 1 of EL2&0 translation regime.
Permission overlay enabled for EL0 access in stage 1 of EL2&0 translation regime.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Select Permission Model. Controls setting of indirect permission model in stage 1 EL2 translation.
This field is RES1 when TCR2_EL2.D128 is 1.

field_value_description.para: Direct permission model.
Indirect permission model.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Protected attribute enable.Indicates use of bit[52] of the stage 1 translation table entry.
This field is RES1 when TCR2_EL2.D128 is 1.

field_value_description.para: Bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry does not indicate protected attribute.
Bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry indicate protected attribute.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

access_permission_text.para: When is implemented, and HCR_EL2.E2H is 1, without explicit synchronization, accesses from EL2 using the register name TCR2_EL2 or TCR2_EL1 are not guaranteed to be ordered with respect to accesses using the other register name.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
MRS
MSRregister
